alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 10:12AM MST until February 23 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 4000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Areas above 4000 feet near Chino Valley, Paulden and Prescott Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will be this morning through early to mid afternoon. Additional snow forecast from 9 AM Today to 6 PM Today: Chino Valley 1 to 2 inches Paulden 0 to 1 inches Prescott Valley 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
